selinko layif hathwani waratath pawathwu selinko “pa්ranama” shishyathwa wadasatahanath samanga shishyathwa himikara gath sankhyawa 857 ikmawa atha.jathika mattamin kusalatha dakwu pa්ranama shishyathwalabhin selinko layif adhyakshawarun samangajathiye anagatha nayakayinta otunu palandawimata ha owun dirimath kirimata pirinamena selinko pa්ranama shishyathwa, selinko layif samagame ‘layif riwods’ yatathe oppu himiyanta ha samajayata laba dena wishesha pa්rathilabhayak we.ema wadapiliwela mangin danata pirinama athi shishyathwa wala mulya watinakama rupiyal miliyana 30ki.uthsawa sabhawa amathamin selinko layif hi pa්radhana widhayaka adhyakshaka aar.renganadan mahatha pa්rakasha kale, thama samagama heta bihiwana nayakayinta kirulu palandawana me awasthawa enathuru itha aashawen bala sitina bawayi.emenma mema daruwange adhyapanaya sandaha dayakathwaya labadimata haki wima pilibandawa thama samagama mahathse abhimanayata pathwana bawa da ohu pawasuweya.demawpiyanta thama daruwange adhyapana katayuthu sandaha mudal waya kirimata apahasu mewan dushkara kalaparichchedayakadi daruwakuge anagatha abhiwruddhiya sandaha athyawashya angayak wana adhyapanaya sandaha sulu dayakathwayak ho laba dima mema wadasatahane aramuna bawa ee mahatha wadiduratath pawasuweya.
